attributes.action: Ensure that the Woolwich Terrorists who receive compensation for injury in prison are obliged to use it to pay for their defence costs.
attributes.additional_details: The recently announced injury caused to him in prison is self inflicted and is a scam to get huge amounts of taxpayer pounds in compensation which he will use to make his family rich.  When he is awarded (because we all know, as a foreign criminal, our dishonourables dare not hold him responsible so he must be paid lots) cash compensation it should immediately be seized to pay for his defence, or his prosecution - we don't care, as long as he, and his family, get none of our taxes.
